body.name: KIMILAR No-Drill Easy Charging Mount for Video Doorbell (2nd Generation - 2020 Release), with Charging Port Mounting Bracket Doorbell Holder Accessories Kits for Houses Apartments Office Door

features: Easy Charging: Special Designed with Charging Connector, you can easily charge your doorbell via the built-in charging connector without take off, the doorbell can be powered by mobile power or socket plug power supply directly without disassemble, you don't need to unscrew the screws anymore.
For Video Doorbell (2020 release): This No-Drill Mount is only compatible with Video Doorbell (2020 release). NOTE: Not for any other model.

No Drill Mount: No Drilling, You can install the video doorbell into your home without drilling holes in the door or wall, No damage to doors or walls. (NOTE: Pls mounted it on a flat and smooth surface, and wipe clean the door or wall before attaching the no-drill mount. It should not be mounted on glass or brick, shingles, and rough stucco surfaces.)

Super Adhesive: High Quality Adhesive & Weather Resistant. This mount is super adhesive strength to keep your doorbell firmly attached to the wall, windproof, rainproof and durable, don't worry about falling off.

Easy to Install: Our Doorbell Mounting Bracket is equipped with installation tools and instructions, you can install it easily, the horizontal positioner will help you to attach the No-Drill Mount on the door or wall horizontally and perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as it should!
reviews.reviewText: Reasonably good quality comes with plenty of hardware to install. Completely customizable to get the proper angle for your door. I would recommend this to anyone with a ring door bell.In my case.... Even if your door bell is facing straight down the walkway coming to the door a slight angle gives you a much better image of the people walking to the door. The better you can center the ring camera lens where the people walk the better image your going to get, doing this seems to really help at night giving you a much clearer image.A must for just about any ring door bell owner!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Secondary placement really sticks.
reviews.reviewText: I got a flood light plus so I move the doorbell from a wooden post on deck to the glass screen door.I had to work at getting this from the post, I started to think we had to use a glue or something.When off it was clean so I placed on the screen door and been there for 3 weeks, so happy with it!Tomorrow, I will probably be getting it off the deck, LoL 😆

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love it I dnt have to take the ring off the door anymore

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Work well but not very visually pleasing
reviews.reviewText: My door bell is at a right angle to my doorso these help the camera show someone walking up to the house and you get a better view of the person other than their side as they face the door.Thesee work as they are designed to work. I did remove the tabs on the back side of one to get it flush to the wall. They just don't as good as the ring doorbell does. If they did not improve my view I would remove them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better View & Easier Mounting for Ring Pro Doorbell Device
reviews.reviewText: I bought these awhile back and installed it on my Ring Doorbell Pro yesterday. I used the largest angle piece. Made my Ring fit the mounting hardware better. Great price and you can't go wrong with this three piece set. Came with a nice small screwdriver and several useful screws needed accessories. I will await to see if I need to add the other two pieces for a better walkway view. I'm happier now with the improved angle view and mounting of my Ring camera doorbell device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked great for my application!
reviews.reviewText: This was a perfect solution for my mounting issue with my Ring doorbell. My front door is at an angle to the sidewalk leading up to it. I needed to angle it about 15 degrees. This product was perfect and I can now see the whole walkway and front porch. Installation was easy and rock solid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars screws don't fit
reviews.reviewText: Original screws don't fit and even if I find screws that fit, they're much smaller, so I would have to drill new holes. Stickers are not very secure!! Great idea but wasn't thought out very well. If you make a product to fit another product, EVERYTHING should work with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Clean look, but... (may need modifying?)
reviews.reviewText: If you have a ring pro and decided you need you camera angled a bit as most do when it comes to this doorbell you may want to read first..The kit itself is nice for the price. ButIf you’ve already installed your ring pro. Then you’ve probably already drilled holes in your wall and used rings installation kit with the nice black back plate with level in it..Well with this kit you have to do some simple modifying.. First you have to get the plastic angle plates and screws to line up correctly with your existing holes you drilled in your wall. Not hard at all. Just hollow out the angle plates screw holes slightly bigger and straight to give your screws some free play when relining everything back up. (The angle plate screw holes are angled) Then the heads of the screws this kit came with are slightly bigger and won’t fit rings mounting screw holes. (If forced they will break or crack the ring doorbell housing and may throw off the sealed camera to a whole new angle) Simply grind the heads down slightly till they fit with ease. Or find longer screws with the same size head as provided with your ring pro doorbell. After that the ring doorbell, angle plate(s) and rings back plate will all line up using the same hole as before..OrIf you don’t mind redrilling your holes and having the old holes exposed or have to fill them, then you can skip that step above. I personally didn’t want that. Or if you have NOT installed your ring pro yet then you can skip this all together. But I don’t think you can use the nice leveling back plate that came with you ring with this kit either.. Hope this helps everyone.

reviews.reviewTitle: muy eficiente y es lo que ocupaba
reviews.reviewText: Muy recomendable cuando necesitas el ángulo adicional para poder girar un poco ti RING. En lo particular me otorgo exactamente el ángulo que requería para apuntar hacia el ingreso y entrada de los coches. 100% recomendado.
